mean_cn: n. 脚注，补充说明；  vt. 给…作注解，在脚注里对…作评论
mean_en: someone or something that is remembered or regarded as a minor or unimportant part of an event, work, etc.
short_phrase: footnote at the bottom of the page
sentence: Footnote is the note placed below the text; don't take it literally!
sentence_trans: 脚注是放在文章末尾的注释，不要从字面去理解这个词好吗！
